paper: ChemBOMAS_ Accelerated Bayesian Optimization for Scientific Discovery in Chemistry with LLM-Enhanced Multi-Agent System

differences.summary: Contradiction in UCB traversal policy (top-5 vs greedy)
differences.why_impacts_score: Contradictory algorithm policy undermines technical soundness and reproducibility

evidence.baseline_quote: UCB formulation and layer-wise top-5 node selection are described (Section 3.4 Step 3).
evidence.final_quote: Section 3.4 says 'top-5 nodes'; Algorithm 1 greedily selects a single child per layer.

differences.summary: Notation inconsistency for exploration constant (κ vs C_p)
differences.why_impacts_score: Notation ambiguity and unexplained constants reduce clarity and reliability

evidence.baseline_quote: Sensitivity to UCB exploration constant (κ=20) is not analyzed (Section 4.2).
evidence.final_quote: Exploration constant is denoted C_p in Section 3.4 and κ in Section 4.2 without equivalence.

differences.summary: Missing edge-case handling for UCB (ln(n_parent) at zero)
differences.why_impacts_score: Missing edge-case handling impedes correct implementation and trust

evidence.baseline_quote: Pseudocode of the full algorithm (Appendix F, Algorithm 1) is provided.
evidence.final_quote: Algorithm 1 uses ln(n_parent) in UCB without describing initialization for n_parent=0.

differences.summary: Initialization fairness discrepancies despite claims of identical prior
differences.why_impacts_score: Unfair or inconsistent initialization compromises baseline comparisons

evidence.baseline_quote: clustering comparison explicitly states 'identical, fixed pseudo-data' across methods (Table 2).
evidence.final_quote: Table 2 shows different 'Initial (%)'; Table 4 Arylation initial varies 45.40 to 78.71.

differences.summary: Overstated efficiency claims and wet-lab iteration/sample inconsistencies
differences.why_impacts_score: Overstated/unclear efficiency and wet-lab reporting weaken credibility

evidence.baseline_quote: claims 'up to a 34-fold improvement' vs BO w/o tree; table shows 26×/29×.
evidence.final_quote: Largest reductions appear 13× and 8×; wet-lab '2 iterations, 43 samples' conflicts with 14 per round.

differences.summary: Technical Quality score lowered due to new contradictions and fairness issues
differences.why_impacts_score: Added issues justify lower technical quality assessment

evidence.baseline_quote: Technical Quality (10): 6 — Sound algorithmic design, yet limited statistical testing and sensitivity analyses.
evidence.final_quote: Technical Quality (10): 5 — contradictions in UCB traversal, fairness/initialization discrepancies, limited statistical testing.
